A galaxy rotating around a big black hole like a giant circle of stars.
A faction of sentient minerals, trapped by Dust in this galaxy

Home Planet Type: Tundra Diplomatic Alignment: Neutral Gameplay: Exploration and Isolationist Main Victory Type: Wonder/Population
The Harmony has been sentient since the dawn of time in the known universe. A fundamental creature born of the energies of the Big Bang, the living rocks of the Harmony are capable of manipulating quantum energies and gravitation. Their mineral nature means that they are closely attuned to planets and rocks across the galaxy; they have an unparalleled ability to identify and exploit natural resources and anomalies. Factions that ally with them share in this unique ability, and those that choose to fight them will find them difficult to dislodge once they have settled in.

Having studied sociology, anthropology, and psychology in unimaginable depth, a group of researchers founded this institute to further their knowledge. The wisdom contained in its records helps a leader to track, understand, predict, and control the sympathies of their subjects.

Auriga housed the greatest site for the study of xenobiology ever created by the genius of the Endless. A towering achievement of industry and science, the surface and crust of the planet were a warren of laboratories, biospheres, and research centers. When the bombs fell during the Dust Wars, this enormous installation became the greatest expanse of ruins -- and store of lost knowledge -- in the known galaxy. Should the laboratories ever be repaired and the data recovered, the scientific benefit would be unimaginable.

The Harmony do not see any interest in hiring mercenaries corrupted by Dust.
The Harmony have no need for managing Dust-corrupted mercenaries.
Click this button to repair the selected ships
Click this button to sort trade routes by food production.
The Food and Science incomes generated by your trade routes with a specific empire.
The mental resources of the Harmony can be oriented towards creating more of their kind or towards studying the technology of the galaxy.
You cannot buyout this item: special improvement.

This is the "stacked" industry value . Industrial overproduction remaining at the end of the turn is stacked. The stacked industry is capped at 5x a system’s industry (up to 7x with the proper technology). A multiplier is applied to the stacked industry, allowing it to increase slightly.
Now a dead, lifeless planet, the husk of Auriga contains an unequalled wealth of Endless ruins.

Previously, option trading was a straightforward if technical calculation based on Black-Scholes and similar pricing models. However, with the inclusion of relativistic and non-relativistic frames these calculations become terrifically complex; any star system that can build the sophisticated computing and trading systems needed to deal in these options gains substantial benefits.

Minerals are known for their unusual affinity for and reaction to certain forms of waves. When a planet is fully "harmonized", the living minerals of the Harmony can instigate a form of particle vibration that coheres the citizens and their daily activities via a system-wide series of grids. The primary role of these grids is to restore a part of the powers that the Harmony lost when they encountered Dust.

Deployment can be materials, supplies, or people. To move them maximum distances at minimum cost requires networks that run in straight lines from point to point. While this creates enormous savings and profits, it also redirects money and land from other uses and upsets those who had inconveniently placed back yards.

The Harmony are unlike other peoples, including in their dietary needs. While they learn to turn living matter into energy forms that provide sustenance, that process is accelerated when there are higher proportions of silicates in the soil. In guiding agricultural exploitation in this direction, they can efficiently improve food production.

The size of orbital platforms was previously limited by variables like orbital distance, gravity, and solar exposure. However, technologies learned from other civilizations have permitted the Automatons to make larger, more densely populated orbitals with greater efficiency and higher output.

Dust can be generated by trade or by fabrication. In this case, enormous containment systems of stimulated Dust can slowly process any physical input into more of this precious substance. The science behind it, for the moment, is not understood, but the results speak for themselves.

Ecologically designed, virtual, advanced scientific laboratories can be built using nothing more than enormous computer capacity and a willing mind. With few requirements for energy and materials, these can be an extraordinarily efficient way to do research.

As the Harmony familiarize themselves with the tools and resources of industry, they come to realize that there is unexpected value the items that are created. By converting production chains to generate certain types of finished products, they can create supplies that provide the emanations upon which the Harmony feed.
A highly specialized form of agriculture, unwanted or surplus output from industrial systems can be used as raw material inputs to these specialized farms that generate Sower foods.

The idea behind these labs is to get advanced technology into the hands of consumers in the form of useful products. As a trickle-down from the military research programs, many high-tech military discoveries can be turned into profitable trade goods.

Ingredients: Stimulated Dust, solar energy, planet-scale processing complexes of tunneled quantum computers. Directions: Combine, and await results as knowledge advances at a blistering speed. Caution: Remain at 2 light-years distance (minimum).

This vast and complex structure handles not only commercial transactions that involve the many strange products of the galaxy, but also has the infrastructure needed to test, preserve, package, and ship them. Auction houses, stasis systems, labs, spaceports and groundports, and merchant offices are all examples of what is created in this enormous project.

In the service of a brutal but sometimes necessary maneuver, the entire infrastructure of a planet can be broken down and sold off. Rather than the use of bombs or other destructive devices, these robots use applied deconstruction technologies to revert useful materials into their basic elements.

Whether the result of an impetuous colonization decision or an impending attack, sometimes everything on a planet must be destroyed and the population removed. Once the civilians are in a colony ship, a series of plasma generators placed around the planet can be triggered to blast all surface installations into ash.
Increases by one the strategic resource deposit size generated by the planet when the improvement is used.

While the theory of quantum computing is ancient, the mechanical difficulties of preparing a physical machine with the appropriate number of qubits (roughly 10^7) meant that it was a practical impossibility. Now that civilization has reached the point where its technology is capable of this, a boom in the solution of exceedingly complex problems is taking place.

The ability to "stack" unneeded industrial capacity as various forms of materials and potential energy is a great advantage for the Automatons. With the use of cutting-edge stasis systems, this ability can be further increased.

As a largely military society, enormous advances in science often occur in military or governmental labs. Now that the need for money to fund expansion is increasing, agencies are created specifically to develop commercial applications for military technology.

Industry is practical, but to the Sophon mind it is over-emphasized. In fact, many day-to-day objects and actions can be efficiently virtualized, freeing up resources and minds to focus on more important things.

Plants are amazing factories for converting water and soil into more complex systems. Though it requires years of study and manipulation, Sower scientists can create plant species that break down and re-convert scrap materials into energy sources.

By augmenting the natural magnetic characteristics of the hull material and using lighter alloys in construction, this improved ship design gives bonuses to tonnage and improves kinetic and missile defense.

By augmenting the natural magnetic characteristics of the hull material and using lighter alloys in construction, this improved ship design gives bonuses to tonnage and improves kinetic and missile defense.

After decades of experimentation with plates of the right size, material, and distance, the vacuum energy created through the quantum mechanics of the Casimir Effect can finally be exploited as an energy source.
While there are some particles that can pass through plasma shielding, this improved version prevents penetration by any baryon particle (primarily neutrons and protons).

A first step in purifying and preparing planets for colonization or terraforming consists of reducing toxic elements in the atmosphere and creating tolerable chemical balances. Recent scientific advances mean that these processes can also be applied to gas giants.

A great deal of practical engineering for ships can be learned from atmospheric sciences. In particular, streamlined and efficient ventilation systems as well as more advanced magnetic and thermodynamic models all aid in creating next-generation ships

Non-baryonic particles had long been the great mystery of advanced physics. Now, a greater understanding of the nature and mechanics of particles such as photons, gravitons, and anti-matter permits the creation of shielding systems that either repel or contain non-baryonic matter.

By lowering the power requirements and toxicity of shields, and increasing their efficiency, it is possible to develop shields on a level that they can be worn by individuals and used to block radiation, noise, and light. The technology can logically be extended to do advanced insulation of any size environment.

The mastery of non-baryonic matter is a great advance for science which would not be possible without mastery of complex mathematical models and their associated physical systems. Wave and particle effects propagated through dark energy can have ripple effects on a solar system level, effecting all forms of matter therein.

Originating on an Ocean planet, the Amoeba have a natural tendency to prefer water environments. In order to simplify the process of Ocean terraforming, a group of scientists created a way to accelerate the conversion of frozen asteroids into viable, liquid water.
This major development in galactic technology was the result of a lab accident involving Automatons nicknamed Alice and Bob, a bell, and a few qubits in strongly nonclassical superposition states.
Recent technological advances allow post-depletion resource extraction. While the planet becomes toxic and ruined, the additional resources can be used to improve ship effectiveness.

The devotion of the Pilgrims to the relics and ruins of the Endless is not merely conceptual. Every installation that they uncover brings them closer to understanding this lost civilization, and the accumulation of this knowledge grows exponentially as more mysteries are unveiled.

This is a point in the physical sciences where the border between math and reality disappears. The ability to create static fields that operate independent of gravitons would not be possible without concepts and technologies borrowed from the Endless.

Though mentally adventurous, Sophons are not physically daring. To ease their society into space travel and extraplanetary settlement, research must be done to adapt familiar Sophon biospheres to various hostile environments.

It is strange for a machine culture to worry about things like community and approval, but as the Sowers expand this becomes a necessity. The science of Sociologics, dedicated to improving relations between Sower entities - grouped or individual - is now a necessity.

As machine beings, the study of terraforming was only of peripheral interest to the Sowers. However, the discovery that the Endless most likely originated on a Tundra planet has driven the Sowers to delve deeply into the sciences of Tundra terraforming.

Tuned to the rhythms of the galaxy, the Harmony are far more efficient at finding and exploiting lodes of Strategic Resources. By linking the living crystal of their ships to the Harmony's own minds, Harmony vessels can also sense the shapes of the galaxy and 'feel' the locations of planets and systems that contain useful resources.
Studies of soil samples from other planets plus advances in understanding of extremophilic bacteria permit scientists to create, under certain conditions, hardier and more productive crops.

First contacts with alien beings cause a rapid development in disparate branches of study - linguistics, anthropology, biology, sociology. These are quickly brought together under the unifying title of "xenology."

First contacts with alien beings cause a rapid development in disparate branches of study - linguistics, anthropology, biology, sociology. These are quickly brought together under the unifying title of "xenology."

Early advances in systems that capture signatures from particles--be they matter or anti-matter--permit simple 'scanners' that poll space-time for any activity--even neutrino, photon and graviton. This information is used to find, identify, and track all objects that will enter or exit a planetary system.

The effect of time dilation and space travel on traditional financial models is non-negligible. This new branch of economics provides a basis for defining investment and profit under non-Newtonian physics in non-Euclidean space-time, e.g. observed interest rates, human capital erosion, and NPV (Net Proto-Heisenberg Value).

Being relatively sedentary and slow-growing, plants are easier to scan and analyze than animals. Systems to tag and scan plant life on a large scale aid immeasurably in efforts to detoxify and colonize new planets and systems.

The complexities of managing a fleet are enormous, and more so when the problems of time, distance, and communication stretch across a galaxy. Systems of Command, Control, and Communications that move at the speed of thought are necessary, and would likely not be possible without a rudimentary understanding of Dust.

The value of a good or service has traditionally depended on simple, two-dimensional models involving supply and demand. However, the ability to move through space-time in unusual ways requires re-thinking of traditional market structures and commodity pricing. Without these forms of advanced, 'hard' economic theory, interstellar trade remains a risky game of chance. With them, it remains a slightly less risky game of chance.

In order to further control the environment and resources of a planet, landscaping can be done on a scale that is almost like re-terraforming. This permits far more intensive use of the surface for agriculture, development, or other purposes. In order to monitor and maintain a more delicate ecological balance, however, industry tends to be minimized.

It is not merely alien races, planets, and stars that are strange, it is the metals and minerals themselves that are discovered 'out there.' Xenominerology' is the study of the many forms of metal and mineral that can exist in the universe, their myriad properties and uses, and an understanding of their monetary value.

Thermodynamic systems are essentially simple circuits of absorption, transport, convection, and condensation. To do this on the level of atoms and molecules is something else, however. A capacity to create nano- and pico-scale units that heat and refrigerate is a game-changer. No pun intended.

While the magic of neutrino communications and quantum tunneling did not turn out quite as expected, the exploitation of other aspects of relativity have permitted the creation of lag-less communications across space and time. While the math cannot be explained by less than forty-two Earth years of study, it has been proved that polarity-inverted time-reversed anti-messages are highly effective, with the loss of the occasional punctuation mark.

The famous saying of the Amoeba: "One being's slavery is another being's public welfare plan" certainly applies here. The knowledge of where the fine lines are between different alien species and their definitions of slavery, exploitation, and hard work are of enormous importance to future galactic entrepreneurs.

Many things influence the outcome of a negotiation--what the other wants, who influences them, how important it is, etc. Every alien race has different values, beliefs, and assumptions; studying these beforehand provides an enormous advantage.

Biologics — drugs made through a biological process rather than chemical synthesis, a category that includes recombinant proteins, vaccines, and antibodies — are the fastest-growing segment of the pharmaceutical industry

Game theory is a complex subject dealing with independent agents, choice, probability, and forecasting. Improved understanding of potential and probable outcomes means that many options and decisions can be considered, even if they were previously considered uncertain or even hazardous.

Far beyond simple networked computers that talk to networked appliances and personal information technologies lies the possibility of what is, more or less, a networked everything. Movement, consumption, creation, and development are all done by entities--living or not--that can be networked to create a seamlessly perfect execution of any function necessary in a society.

Based on the ancient technologies of recombinant gene engineering, accelerated evolution is a pool of techniques that overall permit organisms to adapt and thrive at an very rapid pace. When applied to crops, it produces densely packed fields of disease- and pest-resistant plants that self-fertilize, adapt to intense climate conditions, and even taste good.

As better understanding of the technology behind Dust drives computing power close to infinity, there is almost no limit to the number of variables that can be included in an estimation -- and the accuracy of the associated predictions moves close to perfection. Careful manipulation of events, media, and key personalities can be done in order to always have, for instance, exceedingly favorable poll results.

Academics came up with a mouthful of words for this simple concept: researchers partnering with an advanced AI to improve their chances of success. These systems use a combination of living intuition, rapid calculation and deduction, Dust-enhanced networks, massively parallel search, and political intuition to maximize the outcome of research dollars invested.

Creation of a major financial center on any given planet is a major project -- alien habitats, highly advanced communication infrastructures, specialized universities, and the highest quality shopping and dining are among the pre-requisites. To do this on a level that could turn a solar system into a galactic center of finance is a very rare achievement.

Between observation, study, game theory algorithms, spies, forecasting, and careful consideration of alternatives, almost every negotiation can be resolved in your favor. Highly dependent on the technical capacities of Dust to quantum-compute potential results in real time, few civilizations could imagine achieving this level of domination.

With a large enough portfolio of investments and sufficiently advanced systems, it is possible to guarantee a positive return. Based on computing systems powered largely by Dust, investments are likely to be net positive at least until the heat death of the universe. Beyond that point, contract re-negotiation is likely.

This powerful ability is only possible for advanced civilizations with high concentrations of population. Caused by harmonic waves that are amplified when the entire surface of a planet is developed by members of the Harmony, it provides powerful boosts to the production of Food, Industry, and Science.

A naturally communicative and gregarious species, the Amoebas' society treasures openness and discourse. The science of Groupthink helps encourage the Amoebas to share ideas and common goals with other species as they work toward a peaceful galactic future.
It is one thing to pull resources out of the ground; it is quite another to know how to quality check, refine, encapsulate, ship, and receive them.

Though the Automatons are not great explorers, they are efficient users of new technology. In this case, engineers have expanded the Automaton ability to create vast orbital platforms by using technology and techniques from newly discovered species.
Developed by Craver biologists, certain treatments applied to developing Craver eggs can result in pupae that are highly resistant to radiation.

While Craver workers and drones were once mindless slaves, the advanced needs of a starfaring nation forced society to give them greater levels of intelligence and autonomy. However, new mass techniques of mind control have been developed to prevent these lower classes from becoming restless.

Though a warlike people, the Hissho have always been insular and clan-based. That is why victory is glorified but expansion into space is not. However, through the application of pedagogy, sociology, propaganda, and subliminals, the good of the greater society could be put ahead of local or clan concerns.

Part of the joy of exploring the galaxy is not just finding new skin care products, but also discovering fascinating new foods. However, given the range and complexity of possible food sources, nutrition science needs to go a long way to determine what is and is not healthy.
A natural progression in the development of personal beauty treatments, cosmetics that are intelligent and aware have been developed to make sure that no Horatio is ever less than gorgeous.

As the Pilgrims are a people accustomed to scarcity, they put a great deal of thought into developing systems that preserve goods. In this case, sophisticated energy fields are adapted to extend the natural shelf life of perishable products.

Military and honorable, the Sheredyn are aware that money is one of the ultimate decision makers. Dust retrieval systems were therefore developed to help cull free-floating Dust from areas that they colonize.

Only with the most advanced scientific knowledge can one dare to start playing with Dust. The rewards, however, can be great. For instance, by stimulating Dust in a controlled environment, it can be driven to process and problem-solve at tremendous speed. This is a great achievement, if one survives it.

Dust is both a substance and a currency standard; its monetary form can be generated by cutting back on industry and pouring resources into advanced financial operations. However, research can also be done to find those rare instances of self-replicating Dust, which can be fed raw materials to accelerate its activity.

The growth of the Empire means the growth of its influence. Systems and planets within its frontiers are not merely centers of production; they are agents -- witting or unwitting -- in spreading the cultural, economic, and military influence of the Empire.

Difficulty in controlling vast and complex fleets is always a problem for space navies. By using certain quantum tunneling techniques to communicate instantaneously across great distances, the work of ship and system management can be greatly simplified.

This is an unfortunate necessity. In order to pragmatically shuttle materials and troops, entirely new transportation and logistics networks are required. To maximize efficiency, these must run in straight lines and be adjacent to power sources and transport hubs. In other words, they must be built in urban areas, straight through both public and private property.
High-isotope materials are prized for both their material capacities and their energy content. Manufacturing them in large quantities is key to making them economically viable.
More advanced magnetics permit positrons, a form of anti-matter, to be contained in relatively small units.
More advanced magnetics permit positrons, a form of anti-matter, to be contained in relatively small units.
With development of more powerful magnetics creating the possibility of harnessing plasma in ever-smaller units, science can create plasma fields -- like a shield system -- around very small units.
Traditional hull construction required that many plates be joined together. Improved metallurgy, however, now allows the frame of an entire ship to be cast as single, cohesive units.
Primarily by bringing energy generation down to a portable size, small vehicles or even augmented individuals can transport their own shield systems.
Primarily by bringing energy generation down to a portable size, small vehicles or even augmented individuals can transport their own shield systems.
Primarily by bringing energy generation down to a portable size, small vehicles or even augmented individuals can transport their own shield systems.

Though its relative invisibility to ancient scientific measures made its true characteristics unknown, in fact dark energy has powerful effects for deflecting and lensing baryonic -- or 'normal' -- matter.
Mastery of nonbaryonic particles and leptons in particular have aided scientists in discovering and manipulating the most elusive force of all -- gravity.
One step better than surviving a hit is to never be hit at all. Advances in remote sensing, electronics, and particle physics result in improved defensive systems to take out incoming attacks.

In order to rapidly evacuate or empty a system, a military technology -- actually a combination of technology and martial procedure -- has been developed that reverts everything to either dust or Dust. Either physical elements are reduced to Dust particles, or the buildings and infrastructures themselves are broken down and sold off.

In order to rapidly evacuate or empty a system, a military technology -- actually a combination of technology and martial procedure -- has been developed that reverts everything to either dust or Dust. Either physical elements are reduced to Dust particles, or the buildings and infrastructures themselves are broken down and sold off.

Delving deeply into the bedrock of a planet, the Harmony installs an infrastructure that nullifies the production of Dust in a system, converting those otherwise wasted resources into Food and Science. Due to the method of construction, the Purifier cannot be scrapped unless the system is Razed or subject to a Bombardment.

Via a single, synchronized high-energy blast of supercharged particles emanating from a number of equally spaced generators, a brief surface of highly destructive plasma can be created in a spherical shape around a building, a ship, or even a planet.

Starships must be immune to many different forces. By developing defensive systems that integrate numerous field types that affect both matter and anti-matter, survivability and longevity increase greatly.
By controlling the decay of particles through the use of local stasis fields, new defensive systems and armors have been created that manipulate all four primary energy sources at once.
By controlling the decay of particles through the use of local stasis fields, new defensive systems and armors have been created that manipulate all four primary energy sources at once.

The use of holographic training systems takes a step forward. Recent quantum studies allow real-time communication of certain field and particle types across galactic scales. Hissho scientists have learned to adapt this into holo-comms systems.
At this level of scientific mastery, weapons systems can be fabricated that are quantum-linked, thought-controlled, and partially aware.

In an advanced and automated empire, it is difficult to obtain money for 'unofficial' projects that do not have a straightforward return on investment calculation. The development of sophisticated and surreptitious systems for finding and distributing funds for these efforts is a complex -- but useful -- exercise.

Though the Harmony adapt to the lifestyle of planets and technology, they have not forgotten their past. When a system becomes fully populated, they are able to find resonances within it that let them think and see almost as a single mind.

This recently discovered and highly advanced material is transparent, yet has a hardness rating that rivals orichalcix. While the name has nothing to do with its origin or chemical properties, Horatio thought it sounded nice.

Infrastructure projects can benefit from this newly developed ability to auto-generate structures. Blueprints, bills of order, storage, planning, fabrication, and construction can now be done rapidly and autonomously by independent machines.

A number of improvements in mathematics, materials technology, and control systems have come together to perfect the technology required to fire accurately up through the atmosphere to hit objects in orbit.
While neural networks have existed for ages in theory, models that allow practical application of thinking, real-time interconnected nodes to weapons systems have not been reliably tested until now.
While neural networks have existed for ages in theory, models that allow practical application of thinking, real-time interconnected nodes to weapons systems have not been reliably tested until now.

Every particle of matter in the galaxy is unique, when felt through the senses of the Harmony. By developing technology that augments their capacity to sense the signature vibrations of individual atoms, the Harmony can sense the strengths and weaknesses of any construction that contains metals.

You can now populate stars far from your starting constellation. However, to do this will require effort at all levels of the society. By creating an official program and stressing the need to sacrifice small comforts in service of a larger cause, some of the discontent caused by colonization can be minimzed.

Living in the orbitals and bases around gas giants is exceedingly stressful. Lack of privacy, claustrophobia, homesickness, and numerous shortages combine to make life difficult. This counseling program -- a mixture of independent study, individual sessions, psychotherapy, and medication -- greatly reduces stress levels. These principles are then applied to the general population, helping improve the attitudes towards space colonization.

Networking and biotech are capable of placing any living being in a largely virtual reality. While the body and its needs cannot be ignored, much of what is play, work, and socialization can be done while tied to a network interface. As the effects of overcrowding, congestion, and noise are suddenly removed from daily life, Approval ratings increase notably.

Complex anti-matter and dark matter emanations have been shown to potentially have interesting side effects on brainwaves and nervous systems. Dark radiation transmission, on certain frequencies and at certain rhythms, can apparently soothe and calm agitated systems. While it is perhaps not kind or ethical to manipulate populations this way, it is certainly efficient...

Such a simple thing among members of the same species, and so complex with aliens... trading financial and scientific data requires exhaustive negotiations and complex treaties and explanations covering data formats, measurement standards, time standards, and explanations of exactly what the clause "Act of God" means.

It is a long struggle, but the ability to be seen by multiple alien nations as a reliable and predictable partner reaps innumerable benefits. Whether in diplomacy, trade, or research, the role of a trusted partner is precious and prized.
This center for higher learning brings together many aliens of many different disciplines with a common goal: To better understand each other and promote trade and discourse throughout the galaxy.

A natural next step in opening diplomatic and trade relations is to ensure that traveling members of any species will be welcomed in a way that is healthy and secure for all parties -- from hygiene to cultural preferences to body armor.
This version of Unstable Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at long range, where missiles are most effective.
This version of Plasma Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at long range, where missiles are most effective.
This version of Positron Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at long range, where missiles are most effective.
This version of Unstable Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at medium range, though missiles are least effective here.
This version of Plasma Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at medium range, though missiles are least effective here.
This version of Positron Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at medium range, though missiles are least effective here.
This version of Unstable Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at melee (short) range, where the effect of missiles is average.
This version of Plasma Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at melee (short) range, where the effect of missiles is average.
This version of Positron Missiles is optimized for targeting and effectiveness at melee (short) range, where the effect of missiles is average.
This version of Synchrotron Lasers is optimized for long range, though Beam weapons are least effective here.
These Pinch Guns have been optimized for long range, though Beam weapons are least effective here.
This version of Disruptor Beams is optimized to ruin things at long range, though Beam weapons are least effective here.
This version of Synchrotron Lasers is optimized for medium range, where they are most dangerous.
These Pinch Guns have been optimized for medium range, where they do most damage.
This version of Disruptor Beams is optimized to ruin things at medium range, where they are most effective.
This version of Synchrotron Lasers is optimized to target at melee (short) range, where their effectiveness is only average.
These Pinch Guns have been optimized for targeting and effectiveness at melee (short) range, where their effectiveness is only average.
This version of Disruptor Beams is optimized to ruin things at melee (short) range, where their effectiveness is only average.
This version of Hard Kinetics is optimized to put holes in expensive hardware at long range, though at long distances it does the job poorly.
These High Isotope Slugs use targeting systems optimized for long range, though at long distances it does the job poorly
This version of Strange Warheads disrupts quantum matter from long range, though at long distances it does the job poorly
This version of Hard Kinetics is optimized to put holes in expensive hardware at medium range, where it is marginally effective.
These High Isotope Slugs use targeting systems optimized for medium range, where it is marginally effective.
This version of Strange Warheads disrupts quantum matter from medium range, where it is marginally effective.
This version of Hard Kinetics is optimized to put holes in expensive hardware at short (melee) range, where it does the most damage.
These High Isotope Slugs use targeting systems optimized for short (melee) range, where it does the most damage..
This version of Strange Warheads disrupts quantum matter from short (melee) range, where it does the most damage.
Requiring enormous amounts of energy, this shielding system surrounds the ship with a near-impenetrable barrier of dense, ionized gas.
Ship-to-ground projectiles require highly specialized machining as they need to resist heat, friction, and wind.

As materials science allows ever more powerful charges, payloads, and barrels, ship-based artillery is developed that can fire space-to-surface. As always, key to the success of new warheads is the understanding of the latest defensive armors.

Part of the work of planetary invasion is to create tight frontiers around targeted systems. A barrier of weaponized satellites, reacting in realtime to numerous data sources, are a very effective way to put additional pressure on planetary populations.

Part of the work of planetary invasion is to create tight frontiers around targeted systems. A barrier of weaponized satellites, reacting in realtime to numerous data sources, are a very effective way to put additional pressure on planetary populations.

Technology now exists to create space-based kinetic weapons that can accurately hit individual targets as small as two centimeters. For interdiction, assassination, and general mayhem there are few better tools.

Using the technologies created to puncture atmosphere at high velocity through the use of dense, advanced isotopes, a military factory can build landing craft that can safely deliver heavily armed troops in a minimal time window.

Using the technologies created to puncture atmosphere at high velocity through the use of tightly integrated hulls, a military factory can build landing craft that can safely deliver heavily armed troops in a minimal time window.

The last Law of Physics to go is thermodynamics' third, for now armament can be created that locally defies the forces of entropy. These projectiles are capable of piercing a planet and exiting from its far side; excellent for creating fear but rather hard on the geology.
These murderous anti-personnel weapons randomly destroy population within a system.
These bombs, designed for heavy penetration, select and destroy random infrastructure targets in a system.
Advanced neutrino capture and decay systems are the ultimate goal for creation of inexpensive and ubiquitous power supplies.

A ship's self-protection capabilities can be balanced on-the-fly to react to changing threat profiles. Applying mathematical modeling and game theory, defense systems self-organize to target Fighter and Bomber units.
All of the ship's defensive systems contribute to additional Fighter/Bomber defense.
The ship's Beam defenses contribute to additional Fighter/Bomber defense.
The ship's Anti-Missile defenses contribute to additional Fighter/Bomber defense.
The ship's Deflector defenses contribute to additional Fighter/Bomber defense.
These specialized craft are designed to attack enemy ships and participate in star system bombardment.
Improved shielding means improved survivability. These Heavy Bombers and their plasma payloads are a greater menace to enemy craft.
Taking advantage of the latest technologies, reactive systems improve the defensive capabilites of the Bomber while giving its weapons additional armor-piercing punch.

Taking advantage of the latest technologies, reactive systems improve the defensive capabilites of the Bomber while giving its weapons additional armor-piercing punch.
"We don't call 'em "Leeches" for nothing. Once they target a ship, they won't let go unless you kill 'em." #33CDFF#Sqd. Ldr. Saseav#REVERT#

By using weapons that break down enemy materials at a sub-atomic level, the weapons of these Bombers occasionally cause local interruptions to the nature of causality. So far, permanent changes to known reality have not been observed...
Though designed as defensive elements, Fighters not only attack enemy Bombers and ships but can also participate in star system bombardment.
Using powerful magnetic fields and high-energy plasma weapons, a new generation of fighters can be built that hit harder and are more durable.
A requisite in a galaxy with baryonic and non-baryonic weaponry, these fighters are equipped with ultradense hulls and the latest weaponry.

A requisite in a galaxy with baryonic and non-baryonic weaponry, these fighters are equipped with ultradense hulls and the latest weaponry.
"Without the Elephant's heavy hull, I'd be just another casualty instead of the Hero of the Corana Engagement." #33CDFF#Capt. 'T41' Tifortywun#REVERT#

Small, powerful, and loaded with technology that approaches magic, these small craft are the pinnacle of engineering. Hard to target due to their advanced hulls and lensing systems, they are the final word in small craft power and durability.
These are highly specialized infantry, trained and equipped to participate in the ground invasion of star systems.
A heavily armed and highly mechanized infantry, these troops are more effective in the invasion of star system.

Both troop survivability and firepower are tied to integration of the latest particle weaponry into their mechanized suits. In particular, advanced materials technology is required to isolate troopers from particle effects.

The final phase in creating obedient and indestructible ground troops is to remove fallible, slow-to-repair biological systems from them. The most advanced battlefield units are composed of nearly indestructible, highly automated, sentient droids.
A first step in handling large-scale maneuvers and multiple vessels, the use of sensors and systems to coordinate fleet movement provides a tactical advantage.
A first step in handling large-scale maneuvers and multiple vessels, the use of sensors and systems to coordinate fleet movement provides a tactical advantage.
A first step in handling large-scale maneuvers and multiple vessels, the use of sensors and systems to coordinate fleet movement provides a tactical advantage.
It is an expensive decision to make, but by adding Dust-driven enhancements to shields and defense systems planetary security can be greatly enhanced.

The effects of Dust on members of the Harmony is devastating. This improvement gives them suits and environments permitting them to take Dust, process it into something useful, and rid the system of its corruption.

Based on a system-wide infrastructure of tightly coupled sensors, damage -- taken or inflicted -- is tracked, logged, and measured in order to maximize defensive effectiveness as well as aid in post-battle rebuilding.

Specialized alloys are adapted for use as coatings on movable, nano-scale reflectors. Large arrays of these wave/particle reflectors can be used to deflect, reflect, and de-synchronize particle and beam transmissions, whether they are used for communication or weapons. Effects on the enemy can include backfiring or ineffective weapons, communication failure, and great frustration.

This project takes counter-measures from a local to a system-wide area of effect. Ground defenses, orbital defenses, and system defenses coordinate the use of energy and resources as well as share data for real-time tracking of all objects foreign to the system. This data is sent instantaneously and allows the most efficient use of firepower; it also leads to efficient recovery and recycling of scrap.
These ground-to-space defensive guns get their nickname from the powdery trails left behind when they punch up through clouds on the way to their targets.

Firing from a planetary surface into orbit is a tricky business. By using countermeasures technology in warheads, surface-to-space missiles can avoid perturbances due to atmospheric conditions, debris, and orbital defensive systems.
A nickname for a highly advanced warhead, these projectiles are covered in a seamless, latticed alloy that is nearly impervious.

In order to properly tap into the exploding market of alien tourists, a special infrastructure must be put into place. Travel between planets is a simple problem; travel between cultures is something else indeed. In order to effectively provide an interesting destination for aliens, enormous work is required in public infrastructures, hotels, restaurants, spaceports, and--most particularly--toilets.

The Amoeba have learned a great deal from their time as a spacefaring race, and this is a concerted effort to apply those lessons to industry and agriculture in aquatic environments. As it turns out, the Amoeba society is capable of great efficiencies when exploiting Ocean worlds.

In order to maximize their efficiency, the Automatons have harnessed a limited level of teleportation to improve industrial and logistics processes. As the resulting growth in efficiency does not require additional exploration or travel, it is received very positively.
Primarily through the use of stasis systems and containment fields, additional excess industrial capacity can be stored as parts and Dust.

These advanced complexes produce workers that are highly radiation-resistant. As a result, they can be worked harder and longer before they die in the highly irradiated atmosphere of space, which in turn reduces ship maintenance costs.
A network of state propaganda transmitters, installed throughout the system, emphasize the glory of the Craver military while transmitting soothing subliminal messages.

Starship power systems are usually refined, precise miracles of engineering. However, using dirtier fuels obtained from depleted planets, Craver weapon systems have been developed that, while unsafe and dangerous, provide greater power.

Using their feel for galactic resources, the Harmony is able to build offensive and defensive systems that 'sense' the nature and style of their opponents. Attack and defense are naturally improved by this.

The Harmony is able to design star charts and navigational systems that take advantage of their racial memory as star explorers. Though the ability will fade over time, for a while they will be able to travel more rapidly.

As planets move, the thinkers of the Harmony track and control planetary emanations of matter and reality. When a system is fully populated and 'tuned' in this way, Harmony sages can call up an ephemeral Dyson sphere for system defense. Though less effective than the real thing, it is also much less costly.

The construction of these advanced particle measuring systems uses quantum coupling to transmit battle information to commanders across the galaxy. As a result, officers and academics can learn in real time.

The creation of these community centers on Hissho planets serves multiple purposes: News, information, and entertainment are presented freely to the populace at the same time that the messages from the emperor are reinforced.

By maximizing the useful life and action of every particle in offensive and defensive systems and quantum-coupling them across the galaxy, simple systems are made more effective when fighting several simultaneous battles.
Why merely eat when you can indulge? There is no better way to speed the healthy and rapid growth of a population than to make the finest imaginable meals available at "fast food" prices.

For various reasons, Dust-based beauty aids are more effective in dry environments. As these aids are expensive, frivolous, unnecessary, and highly effective, demand for them has gone through the roof -- as have requests to transfer to arid planets.

Ships built with interior glassteel bulkheads allow all Horatios to see what is going on at all times. As even the cargo of these ships is visible, what could be more natural than to load them with the most beautiful thing in the galaxy -- more Horatios?

The Installation of these centers near urban areas provide areas where surplus or donated supplies can be stored. Particularly useful in the event of invasion or blockade, Stasis Centers can supply a populace with goods for many years.

These places of worship are more than mere imitations of the Endless or centers of mindless adulation. As Endless wonders are discovered and analyzed, the knowledge hoarded in these temples grows. And as insights grow, so does the admiration of the populace.

Though they are religious, the Pilgrims can respect agnosticism if it is well argued. It is more as a joke than for any other reason that they refer to habitats that are unaffected by pressure and gravity as "baro-agnostic."

When a victorious battle has ended, Dust is often left behind in the form of actual Dust particles or salvageable goods. This application of Dust retrieval technology allows the Sheredyn to convert the debris of a space battle into currency.

Quantum-tunneled advanced modifications to communication systems appear to be something like magic when first used. These mods help to collect data and command complex systems, offering enormous efficiency gains.

Ecologically designed, virtual, advanced scientific laboratories can be built using nothing more than enormous computer capacity and a willing mind. With few requirements for energy and materials, these can be an extraordinarily efficient way to do research.

What we would call "hearth" translates into Sophon as "place where I can think without being interrupted." By creating habitats and environments reminiscent of traditional Sophon labs and libraries, inhospitable planets can be made appealing for colonization.

Ingredients: Stimulated Dust, solar energy, planet-scale processing complexes of tunneled quantum computers. Directions: Combine, and await results as knowledge advances at a blistering speed. Caution: Remain at 2 light-years distance (minimum).

A spin-off of Sociologics, Task Pathing is a form of project-oriented programming that aligns Sower priorities. When installed, these protocols tag all decision functions not aligned to a group task as irrelevant, thus guaranteeing cooperation.
Knowledge of cold weather biology and atmospheric conditions has allowed the Sowers to develop this sophisticated terraforming engineering that simplifies transformation into Tundra planets.

Dust can be generated by trade or by fabrication. In this case, enormous containment systems of stimulated Dust can slowly process any physical input into more of this precious substance. The science behind it, for the moment, is not understood, but the results speak for themselves.

A key element in projecting the power of the Empire, these governmental offices claim to aid businesses in setting up contacts and deals. In fact, they are efficient centers for transferring information and funds between private, government, and military entities.

As science seems to approach magic, some astonishing new technologies have sprung from research focused on a completely different outcome. In this case, weapon damage is incremented via a system that couples particles in real time between weapon and target.

Though a member of a society known for industrial efficiency, Dar-Omnis’s interests lay in the psychology and motivation of sentient beings – whether animated by blood or circuitry. This Automaton studied social structures and networks in order to discover the secrets of leadership, motivation, and the development of sentient relations. Studying Dust networks in the lab one day in search of greater understanding of resilient interactions, Dar-Omnis was exposed to a high concentration of dispersed Dust. Now its advanced emotional intelligence is combined with an ability to make faultless decisions, making it an extremely efficient leader.

The name Lucrum is well known among traders, bankers, and grumpy casino owners across the galaxy. A genius at probability and statistics, Lucrum was in the middle of playing five simultaneous hands of high-speed Sophon blackjack with a six-deck pack when he was struck by a moment of lucidity. In a brief flash he realized that his long-term exposure to Dust had given him supra-genius mental capacity, that he would have an incredible future with the mysterious and covert guild known as the Dust Collective, and that the strange, secretive woman who he seemed to keep running into was actually their recruiting agent, waiting for him to realize what was going on. Now a key figure in the Collective, Lucrum understands the fine boundary where risk meets reward perhaps better than any other living being. This fact masks another, more interesting skill: An excellent comprehension of the practical powers and limits of Dust.

Unlike many elements of the Harmony, who were completely disoriented by their contact with Dust, this one was intrigued rather than confused by the sudden onslaught of individuality and the need to generate productive work. A thinker and philosopher, it was eager to try out bizarre social constructs like having a ‘name’ and doing a ‘job’. Now a scientist specializing in waves and particles, Ponders uses its instinctive and inductive thought process to feel the movement of galactic bodies and sense the shape of galactic matter.

An escaped viral lab experiment that evolved into a useful member of galactic society, Enil-Nex’s rise to sentience moderated its drive to control and consume into a simple desire to survive. Learning that through cooperation it could gain more than through conflict, Enil-Nex understood that its defensive skills as a viral entity (mutating forms, reacting to pathogens, building up resistances, allocating resources) translated surprisingly well when using Dust, rather than biological life, as a vector for its actions. Now a Hero skilled in planetary defense, it is well-liked and -respected (though rarely hugged).

"A true Zolya." Tulela had first heard that phrase used in reference to her during a planetary hunting expedition at age ten, when she had used her mother's rifle to kill a sabertooth that was prowling around the carcasses they had skinned and hung. Another in that famous dynasty of orange-haired, fearless adventurers, Tulela rose to leadership of her clan at twenty-six and successfully marshaled the survivors when the pirates of the ABC burned them out of their haven. Seeking another home, she took the decision to restore her family to Auriga when her family's combat medic and problem solver, Opbot, figured out its probable galactic coordinates. Independent, canny, and fearless, it is said that Tulela has far more friends than enemies -- because the enemies don't survive very long.

Opbot has been working for Zolya's clans ever since they rescued him from the slow destruction of the planet Auriga. A highly efficient medical robot, Opbot's skills in surgery, first aid, and emergency medicine were frequently required by the Zolya family's tumultuous lifestyle. He never forgot the ruins of Auriga, however, and one day after centuries of service Opbot decided to rediscover the lost planet. That work required many decades, however, due to the fact that living with the Zolya included a lot of fighting, running, attacking, escaping, blowing up ships, and getting one's own ship blown up. When he finally came down to a five-sigma probability of Auriga's location, he presented his findings to Tulela Zolya. Though at first indifferent, Opbot was able to convince her that something of value -- in fact, of enormous value -- was still hidden there.

Unreasonable, this is? We believe that reaching out in a spirit of synchronism improves a conflictual situation.
Judicious, this seems. A cease fire is certainly preferable to continuing our mutual conflict.
Enticing, is it not, our idea? We imagine trading messages to be an improvement on trading salvos.
Irrational these thoughts may be. Yet we persist in seeking co-operative solutions to worsening relationships.
Provocative, is it not? Further cooperation can but enhance out mutual goals and the greater equilibrium.
Compelling, our gambit must be! As we admire your people, the thought of closer cooperation presents itself.
Ludicrous this may appear. But we feel that by proposing this alliance we can forestall the worst.
Tantalizing, our scenario: Deeper cooperation, greater concordance, lesser conflict.
Beguiling is our offer! We are persuaded that deepening our natural associations will bring enormous serendipity.
Inconceivable! That is our opinion. However, when options are reduced to one, we bow to and embrace the inevitable.
Prudent, we feel this is. If we continue to ignore our obvious antipathy, it would disserve our greater ambitions.
Outrageous, we agree! Yet we feel no other alternative manifests itself in spite of our esteem.
Eccentric, you may think we are. Yet in our experience, mutual reliance offers greater long-term prosperity.
Discerning, we are. Growing an alliance between our societies inevitably cultivates the greater good.
Enthralling - that is how we find your culture. We can only imagine an alliance transformed by your august presence.
Insulting - is that your reaction? Regardless, in our estimation departure from the alliance is the wisest course.
Perspicacious, this proposal seems. We are convinced that the alliance can be further improved by your absence.
Intriguing, we feel, not surprising. Your greater aspirations may be better served outside the constraints of our alliance.
Unthinkable, really? We extend this proposal in spite of that, submitting that peace is preferable to conflict.
Interesting, at the least. We hope to ease discordance, improve affiliations, and encourage propinquity.
Fascinating you are! Perhaps through peace more wondrous phenomena might occur than could do so through war.
Ridiculous? Perhaps. Yet a gesture of trust could well remedy our deteriorating relations.
Inviting, this recommendation is! We act in a spirit of greater concord, seeking meaningful discourse between our peoples.
Captivating, this appears to us. We are convinced that greater mutual comprehension will improve our individual goals.
Facetious you may find our proposal. Yet our worsening affairs compel us to seek mercantile solutions.
Thoughtful, we are. We hope to match the equilibrium of our relations with measured, sagacious commerce.
Stimulating, to say the least. Let us see if greater economic intimacy brings even better conceptual concordance.
Ridiculous, approaching madness. We do not entirely understand why you offer this.
Unlikely, given the data. Though we understand you are making an effort.
Interesting, your desire for peace. We consider that your proposal arrives propitiously.
Entrancing, this notion. What could we desire more than an end to conflict and improved communication?
Foolish, to say the least. We are curious as to why you feel this to be of interest.
Doubtful, as it stands currently. But we appreciate that you are willing to discuss.
Appealing, it is. We believe that improved cooperation brings greater equilibrium.
Excellent, your thinking. It is our belief that mutual cooperation leads to mutual profit.
Insipid, in our opinion. We do not see sense in your alliance -- or your proposal.
Dubious, this idea. Though there may be promise, acceptance of the current proposal would be injudicious.
Titillating, we might say! We dream of alliances that build harmoniously toward a prosperous future.
Excellent, unquestionably! We predict a glorious future for the associated communities.
Unsurprising, obviously. Our relations were trending in this direction.
Unnecessary, we feel. But such a declaration hardly requires our agreement.
Melancholy is our mood! How sad that as relations seemed to be improving, you choose to destroy them.
"Ludicrous" is an appropriate term. How could we associate with beings who so poorly understand us?
Improbable, in our estimation. Not impossible, but unlikely given current parameters.
Tantalizing, we do agree. Our destiny is to conjoin efforts and render the galaxy more equanimous.
Irresistible, your proposal! Together our empires shall build a numinous destiny.
Heartbreaking, though inevitable, given the unfortunate state of our relations.
Unfortunate, even precipitate! Is departure from our community the sole possibility?
Reckless, undoubtedly! Your inauspicious decision renders us disconsolate.
Doomed to failure. We cannot understand that such an important subject is broached so churlishly.
Implausible, your prospectus. We are inclined towards peace, but wary of precipitous action.
Alluring are the words of your diplomats. A sane and sagacious people can only wish for peace.
Enthralling, this treaty you proffer! great civilizations advance through harmonious concordance.
Impossible, of course. We cannot comprehend an act if such sincerity after an offer of such insincerity.
Suspicious, as we see it. Your offer is neither absurd, nor completely unobjectionable.
Seductive, even desirable. We see opportunities for greater sympathy and sincerity.
Fascinating, this prospectus. We are persuaded that such generous terms indicate great opportunities.
Risible, at best. We are not convinced that you understand the concept of "fair trade."
Unconvincing, this gambit. We are not opposed a priori, but find this insufficiently felicitous.
Attractive, your offer! We hold the hope that our nations achieve greater co-prosperity.
Bewitching this offer is. How could reasonable sentients, as we strive to be, respond negatively?

The galaxy is vast, and its secrets too many to count. Given the many civilizations that have risen and fallen since the advent of intelligent life, it is certain that great knowledge, vast riches, and gruesome tales all await the hand of the intrepid voyager As space is further explored and more systems become homes for new colonists, bit by bit the secrets of the old peoples will see the light of day. What more is there to learn of the Endless and their allies and enemies? Only time, and Dust, and tenacity will bring the answer...

Generations ago, Nadjne Zolya made room for Opbot in an overcrowded ship leaving a dying planet. Though Opbot was a skilled medical operative, he had accepted that the humanoids would save themselves first and leave him to decay as magneto-gravitational cataclysms made the planet of Auriga unlivable. Surprised by their offer, Opbot repayed the Zolya clan for decades, then centuries, as their restless, homeless clans moved from planet to planet, system to system, and battle to battle.
Driven from their simple tundra world by a fleet of pirates, they once again took up the life of homeless marauders. It was then that Opbot had the idea to rediscover Auriga; an idea that quickly blossomed in to an all-consuming passion. But memories are faulty, galaxies move, and records are often missing or poorly kept; it turned out to be far more complex than he thought.
It was hundreds of years later that he was sure enough of his findings to present them to a very hesitant Tulela. But Opbot told her of what he remembered: Endless warrens of laboratories, storehouses of knowledge, ruins and artifacts scattered across the landscape like pebbles on a beach. In the end, Tulela agreed to seek that lost and fabled planet.
As their tiny fleet arrives, other civilizations that have tracked them or searched themselves for the planet begin to appear; the name of Auriga is famed across the settled galaxy. Auriga will once again become a focus of war and strife, for whatever faction can find, and hold, this precious world will have access to the greatest scientific wisdom of the galaxy.

The Harmony has arrived. Not like a meteor shower or a landslide, but like erosion or plate tectonics. They have been moving since the birth of the universe, passing through the galaxies, as they seek The Core. Their migration was deliberate, calm, inevitable. Dust was their downfall. In the galaxy of the Endless they were ensnared; this strange technological creation that affected particles, fields and waves broke the single movement of the Harmony into a cacaphony of individual elements. The Dust took away their propulsion, their ability to hear the resonances of the universe, and their shared consciousness; in their place it offered language, individuality, mechanics, and control. Their brethren continue elsewhere in the universe, unknowing and unaffected. But in this galaxy, the Harmony have fallen from grace and turned into gravity-enchained individuals.
The Harmony saw Dust, then, as an infecting menace or a plague. With their new-found skills of ship construction they began to take measures to destroy it -- measures that they saw as necessary and entirely moral. What the Harmony would refer to as the Righteous Cleansing will be referred to by others as the Harmony Wars, for the Harmony made no differentiation between "inhabited" and "uninhabited". To them, a planet could only be categorized as either "infected" or "clean."
Attacking in small, individual ships that are difficult to hit, purposefully targeting Dust-infected infrastructures and populations, the rest of the galaxy lived the arrival of the Harmony as a minor apocalypse. Other peoples will respond in kind, creating Fighter and Bomber craft to counter the Harmony's unusual tactics, bringing the war to their enemy. Planetary bombardment and invasion will take a new turn; new heroes will rise up to counter the threats.
Click to minimize the panel and focus the camera on the system where the event occurs.

The Harmony is able to design star charts and navigational systems that take advantage of their racial memory as star explorers. Though the ability will fade over time, for a while they will be able to travel more rapidly.
You notice that your relationship with $Empire has improved.
You notice that your relationship with $Empire has degraded.
$Empire is reacting to the population density of the galaxy and the speed with which colonial expansion is occurring.
$Empire seems to be unable to accumulate Dust, and needs to find additional sources of revenue.
$Empire is noting -- very carefully -- the current balance of power and the impact of your military strength.
The power of your fleets is of great interest to $Empire. Strength and weakness can both affect diplomatic standing.
In the great game of diplomacy enemies can become friends, and vice versa. $Empire is beginning to look at you in a different light.
The relative rank of your nation among the peoples of the galaxy is currently preoccupying the political discussions of $Empire.
Certain other peoples in the galaxy, in particular $Empire, think that it may be wise for you to rethink your strategy of alliances.
Exploration of the galaxy is well under way, and it is time to change the diplomatic stakes. $Empire even wonders if the time for military conflict has arrived...
$Empire cannot help but note the unusual duration of the current war. Is perseverance an advantage or a flaw?
In any protracted conflict there will be winners and losers. $Empire has noticed which side you have ended up on.
Your rate of expansion, and the number of Outposts versus the number of established colonies, is the subject of discussions among $Empire diplomats.
Commerce is vital to the development of the galaxy, and $Empire is noting the revenue that your trade routes generate.
It can be risky to be seen as too powerful, for then other foes may group together in opposition. $Empire is wondering if the time is ripe to oppose the leading empire.
The political analysts of $Empire have ranked the empires of the galaxy according to their level of success. Your position in that ranking is attracting attention.
The galaxy can be explored widely or understood deeply; $Empire believes that the balance between those two objectives is not ideal.
Fleet $Fleet cannot reach its rally point. The fleet will stay in orbit awaiting for your orders to move.
The star around which the legendary planet Auriga orbits has been discovered!
The system that holds the famous planet Auriga has been colonized!
Daring adventurers have settled Auriga, the lifeless planet rich in ruins and history.
On the moon Noren that orbits Auriga, a temple of the Endless has been surveyed
The ancient Wonder that crowned the planet Auriga has been restored, and the faction that holds the system now gains its powers.
Terraforming has been executed on the planet Auriga, changing its very nature but not the secrets that it holds.
The Auriga system has been conquered by another faction; another people now hold this legendary world.
The installations and infrastructure of the planet Auriga have been razed, yet the secrets of its past remain.
Colonized by a greedy faction, the planet Auriga has been depleted of its resources and its once-rich surface is now an over-exploited wasteland.
The energies of Dust have been siphoned off Auriga, removing some of the strangeness from this famous planet.
Toggle this to display the locations of Rally Points.
Due to a change in the galactic diplomatic situation, one or more of your Rally Points is no longer usable.

Exploration has its hazards and its rewards. This system is almost like a gift waiting to be unwrapped; remnants of orbital stations from an ancient civilization await your scientists. They are curious, as the ruins do not seem to be from the Endless.
Your exploration vessel has arrived safely in a new system. You find an old probe of unknown design that contains a map of much of the surrounding regions of space.
The nation is excited at the discovery of a new planetary system. Your explorers are perplexed, however, as there is a high concentration of Dust yet no trace of the Endless.

Another alien system, complete with more alien ruins. One cannot but wonder how many peoples rose, flourished, and fell in the silence of the galaxy; many peoples other than the Endless left their traces.

This system contains remnants of enormous, ancient ruins, with deposits of Dust in strange shapes and forms. For the first time, even the mountains were sculpted into decorations for some ancient race of vastly wealthy - and powerful - beings.

This system contained an ancient foundry that apparently created copies of ships for some long-lost race. You gain an additional vessel, but the factory consumes itself to provide the materials. The traces that remain do not resemble in the least the technology of the Endless.

It seems that you are not the first sentient beings on the planet, though judging by the remains the previous inhabitants died warring, using vast weapons of Dust in the air and on the ground.

The vegetation of this planet is different from the one the settlers knew. Brown and purple are as present as green, with strange plants aligned in vast fields and orchards by ancient and long-lost hands.
Exploration has its hazards and its rewards. Here, at least, a ship touches down safely and a new life begins - though the act of colonization is often far less simple.
Your crew has had a safe landing and much of the equipment survived the voyage -- congratulations on a successful colonization.
The nation breathes a sigh of relief at another successful colonization. So much can go wrong, between technology and psychology, that any success is a great success.
Another alien planet, and additional alien ruins. One cannot but wonder how many peoples rose, flourished, and fell in the silence of the galaxy.
Remains of ruins, of Dust, of strange shapes and forms. In this strange place, seems that the mountains were even sculpted like decorations for the wealthy.
The planet appears empty of traces of ancient civilizations; sometimes ruins and artifacts are even stranger when they are absent.
It seems that you are not the first sentient beings on the planet, though judging by the remains the previous inhabitants died warring, knee-deep their own pollution.
Click this button to select this option.
Click this button to select this option.
Click this button to select this option.
The vegetation of this planet is different from the one the settlers knew. Brown and purple are as present as green, and the children in particular are frightened by the shapes of the trees.
The more you see of the universe, the more you realize you know nothing. Here, for instance, you have found ancient ruins, and ponder their meaning. Outpost? Monastery? Expedition?
As you explore, you find ruins full of Dust tracery. You believe that they were left by the Endless, the first colonizers of this vast galaxy.
Another planet yields its mysteries! And yet, adds new ones. For though there are ruins that you believe were by the Endless, there are other, older ruins beneath them.
The remains on this planet were of an ancient civilization. Most likely the Endless, though with all of the different sects and migrations even some of the Endless do not resemble the Endless.
With new colonization, knowledge of archaeology progresses. You even discover ruins that do not seem to belong to the Endless, but to other lost peoples.

The ruins of the Endless have an identifiable architecture; though they come in many styles certain qualities and materials unite them. Though now you find some that even by the standards of the Endless are strange - and ancient.

Click this button to select this option.
Click this button to select this option.
Though your colonists place their first city not far from an ancient ruin - with access to water and flat land it is logical - something about the ruins are odd and unusually alien.
The colonists have discovered a strange field here, with rings of Dust laid out in a regular pattern. To what purpose...? The strangeness of alien worlds is sometimes unsettling.
You have found an ancient battlefield of the Endless on this planet. Great buildings lie broken by something other than the ravages of time, and the ruins are unusually rich in Dust.
This planet is littered with fallen satellites that were once an energy source for the Virtual Endless. But what brought them crashing down from orbit remains a mystery.
A geothermal energy plant is the only thing that remains of this Concrete Endless city; whatever brought their downfall apparently desired their source of energy.
The ruins here are strange indeed - there is nothing but Dust, scattered across certain areas of the planet as though great sculptures of that substance suddenly lost their cohesion and fell.
The patterns of Dust you see on this planet are unlike any others. Clearly, there is a great more than suspected to this strange, misunderstood substance.
Ruins on this planet indicate some sort of massive siege on a mountaintop. Strangely, the mountain itself contains no ruins or remnants of civilization, just high concentrations of Dust.
Artifacts strewn in the ruins show an ancient civilization existed. But the size and shape are like nothing you have seen before; and your scientists and archaeologists wonder what it may mean.

In an otherwise peaceful valley your colonists find remains of artifacts strewn about haphazardly. But where are the ruins of the civilization that left these? Why does nothing but Dust remain?

Dust was the Harmony's downfall. They see it as a menace and a plague, and no source of Dust production will be tolerated on any Harmony star system.
The intergalactic currency is "Dust", a rare resource left from the time of the Endless. As it is the reason for the chaos within the Harmony civilization, they would rather destroy it than use it.

The empire view is slightly different when playing the Harmony faction.
As Harmony your Dust treasury is set to 0 and will remain this way due to their aversion for this resource.
As sentient rocks they have no concept of Approval. Population growth, production and research will continue without any issues of Approval or morale.
Increasing your Conversion rate will also increase your Science production, but will reduce your Food production. Reducing the Conversion rate will have the opposite effect.
The Harmony need only 3 Luxury or Strategic Resources to obtain an Abundance bonus.
As a consequence of their Dust intolerance, Harmony cannot buyout construction, but do not have upkeep costs.
The Harmony do not see any interest in hiring heroes corrupted by Dust and thus will not hire them for fleets or systems.
Special slots are required to build the special modules, and their availability depends on the type of hull.
As you progress in the game, you will discover new modules to install in your ships. Use these tabs to switch between the families of modules: Weapon and Defense, Support, and Special.
To add or remove a module on a ship, simply click on + or - symbols in the “Available Modules” area.
Some categories may have several module options depending on range or specialization. This is trye for weapons as well as for special modules.
Module status is shown as follows:
A module which has not been researched will be disabled (grey).
Adding a module will be impossible if the weight of that module exceeds the remaining tonnage capacity or, as in this case, if the module requires access to a Strategic Resource.
A module included in the ship design is highlighted with a blue frame. The quantity of that module is displayed in the bottom-right of that area.
The ship area summarizes within each category box The modules currently selected for the Ship Design are summarized within each category box.
Some modules can be damaged. Their repair rate depends on the system their ship is orbiting (own or ally).

The Invasion action triggers a siege to conquer an enemy's system. You will also have the choice to send bombs or land troops in order to speed your invasion (if you have enough power and the proper modules are installed)
Use the Retrofit button to upgrade Ships or entire fleets to the latest revision of their Ship Design. This will cost you some Dust. Note that the Harmony cannot use this.

You can assign a Hero to govern a Star System (unless you are playing Harmony faction). Depending on their specializations, the Hero can provide bonuses in things like production output, defense, etc.
You can select a Targeting Action for the following combat phase.
Your Fleet Formation is displayed here.
You can hide the interface. Click on the "H" key to show it again.

These are camera buttons. The first one allows you to control the camera using your mouse and the arrows on your keyboard. The second allows you to follow a squadron of fighters or bombers if any are in the fleet. Use the arrow keys to switch between them.
You can pre-select a Target strategy for the first and following phases.
You can pre-select a Fleet Formation for the duration of the combat.

The first column displays how much damage you inflicted on the enemy as well as the average efficiency of the enemy's defenses as a percentage (how much damage passed through the enemy defenses or was stopped by them).

The last column is the opposite, showing how much damage the enemy inflicted on you, and how efficient your defenses and weapons were. Analyzing offensive and defensive stats will allow you to optimize your ship designs to better defeat your enemies.
The Harmony were born at the same moment as the universe.
As old as time, they traversed the galaxies,
... seeking the mysterious confluence of galactic rhythms they call The Core.
But that changed forever when they encountered Dust.
From a movement to a series of individuals, from a sense of the Core to a
sense of loss, the Harmony are no longer what they were.
But they remember what happened, and will never renounce
... their relentless war against the Dust that corrupted them.
is a history of struggle and survival.
To be a Vaulter is to work hard,
and even in the deep dark of space,
it never fails to give us hope.
